name: FormDialog Component Pattern
description: Standardized form dialogs with FormDialogSection and Field composition, design token integration, and accessible ID generation

trigger.errorMessage: Need to create a form in a dialog/modal

steps.description: Import FormDialog, FormDialogSection, FormDialogField from components/FormDialog
Use useFormDialog hook for state management: const { isOpen, isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting, open, close } = useFormDialog()
Wrap form content in FormDialog with props: open, onOpenChange, title, description, onSubmit, isSubmitting, submitText
Use gradientTitle={true} for creation dialogs, gradientTitle={false} for edit dialogs
Group related fields with FormDialogSection: <FormDialogSection title="Details">...</FormDialogSection>
Wrap each input with FormDialogField: <FormDialogField label="Name" required error={errors.name} htmlFor="name"><FormInput id="name" /></FormDialogField>
Use form components from components/ui/forms (FormInput, FormSelect, FormTextarea, FormSwitch) which integrate design tokens
Choose appropriate size: sm (single field), md (2-5 fields), lg (sections), xl (complex), full (multi-step)
